bibl.title: On the Derveni Papyrus.
bibl.note: Regrets et mise en garde à propos de la publication non autorisée du papyrus de Derveni dans: ZPE 1982. "The editors (K. Tsantsanoglou and G.M. Parássoglou) plan to submit to the press by mid 1984 their own, proper edition with complete plates."
bibl.seg: Turner Eric G., Kyriakos Tsantsanoglou and George M. Parássoglou, On the Derveni Papyrus.

Regrets et mise en garde à propos de la publication non autorisée du papyrus de Derveni dans: ZPE 1982. "The editors (K. Tsantsanoglou and G.M. Parássoglou) plan to submit to the press by mid 1984 their own, proper edition with complete plates."
